Title: Alexander and the Terrible Horrible No Good Very Bad Day
Author: Ray Cruz
Award: ["George C. Stone Center for Children's Books Recognition of Merit Award", "Georgia Children's Book Award", 'Indies Choice Book Award', 'California Young Readers Medal']
Description: Alexander knew it was going to be a terrible day when he woke up with gum in this hair.And it got worse...His best friend deserted him. There was no dessert in his lunch bag. And, on top of all that, there were lima beans for dinner and kissing on TV!
